mapper.select:
select
distinct
,
from muse.param_template
order by ${orderByClause}
select id, name from muse.param_template where uid = #{uid} and valid = 1 order by id desc
select id, name from muse.param_template where uid = #{uid} and valid = 1 and name like #{name}

select
distinct
from muse.param_template
order by ${orderByClause}

id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
`uid` = #{record.uid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
`name` = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

`status` = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER},

remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{record.content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
